      • json

        public DefaultRequestDefinitionBuilder json​(Content content)
        Description copied from interface: RequestDefinitionBuilder
        Sets a JSON request from given content. It automatically applies Content-Type: application/json header.
        Specified by:

      • json

        public DefaultRequestDefinitionBuilder json​(String relativePath)
        Description copied from interface: RequestDefinitionBuilder
        Sets a JSON request from given file. The file must reside in same package as the test in the directory with the same name as the test e.g. src/test/resources/org/example/foo/MySpec. The file is created automatically during first run if it does not exist yet with empty object definition. It automatically applies Content-Type: application/json header.
        Specified by:
        json in interface RequestDefinitionBuilder
        Parameters:
        relativePath - a JSON request file
        Returns:
        self

      • content

        public DefaultRequestDefinitionBuilder content​(String relativePath,
                                               String contentType)
        Description copied from interface: RequestDefinitionBuilder
        Sets a payload for the request from given file. The file must reside in same package as the test in the directory with the same name as the test e.g. src/test/resources/org/example/foo/MySpec. The file is created automatically during first run if it does not exist yet with empty object definition. It automatically applies Content-Type header.
        Specified by:
        content in interface RequestDefinitionBuilder
        Parameters:
        relativePath - relative path to the payload file for the request
        contentType - content type of the payload
        Returns:
        self
